title: Nextcloud Setup
description: Deploy secure Nextcloud instance for file sharing, collaboration, and productivity with enterprise features.
detailedDescription: Set up a complete Nextcloud cloud storage and collaboration platform with enterprise-grade security and features. I configure file sharing, office suite integration, team collaboration tools, and advanced security measures. Perfect for organizations wanting full control over their data and collaboration tools.

packages.name: Personal Cloud
features: SSL certificate with Let's Encrypt auto-renewal
Essential apps installation (Files, Photos, Calendar, Contacts)

packages.name: Business Cloud
features: Automated daily backups with retention policy
User management for up to 25 users

packages.name: Enterprise Cloud
features: Compliance features (encryption, audit logs, retention policies)
Complete data migration from Google Workspace, Dropbox, OneDrive
